title: Textile, ca. 1780
medium:
Medium: linen warp; cotton weft 
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (2 pieces sewn together): 161 x 144 cm (5 ft. 3 3/8 in. x 56 11/16 in.)
Repeat H: 36 cm (14 3/16 in.)
description: Ruins with inclined, decayed trees alternate with foundation with inclined tree. A cherub is sketching the ruin and another cherub is fishing in front of the fountain.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1780.Medium: linen warp; cotton weft 
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave. 1980-34-12.
